same.label: Same
same.description: If two or more side's numbers are equal to their opposing numbers, then those cards are flipped.

plus.label: Plus
plus.description: If the sum of one side and its opposing number is equal to the sum of another side and its opposing number, the cards are flipped.

combo.label: Combo
combo.description: If cards are flipped with the Same or Plus rules, they will act as if they were newly placed and will flip cards around them. Only the basic greater than rule applies for these.

coinToss.label: Coin Toss
coinToss.description: If enabled, each player gets one coin toss per game. The coin will land on a random board spot. If there's a card on that spot, it will be flipped, whether it's yours or your opponents. This also counts as your turn.

vsync.label: V-Sync
vsync.description: Synchronize the framerate with your monitor's refresh rate.
